episodes.title: 190. JPUSA Part III: An Interview With Jaime Prater
episodes.description: We finish up JPUSA with an interview with a former member and abuse survivor, Jaime Prater. Check out his two films. https://youtu.be/0V4G00Gl51c?si=nFnx-pN5qVafHksC https://youtu.be/JgSwnaMVjQE?si=5t_kPokSZa2u7ofE

episodes.title: 189. JPUSA Part II
episodes.description: We dive back into JPUSA and we talk about the abuses that happened in the commune so just a content warning.

episodes.title: 188. JPUSA Part I
episodes.description: This week we start our journey through the world of Jesus People USA or JPUSA.

episodes.title: 187. The Infancy Gospel Of Thomas: Jesus Christ!
episodes.description: This week we dive into an early christian book which cover's Jesus' childhood.

episodes.title: 186. The Woman They Wanted Part III
episodes.description: We finish up Shannon Harris' book The Woman They Wanted. Sorry it took so long

episodes.title: 185. The Women They Wanted Part II
episodes.description: We continue our talk on Shannon Harris' book The Women They Wanted

episodes.title: 184. We Read: The Woman They Wanted by Shannon Harris
episodes.description: This week, we dive into The Women They Wanted by Shannon Harris, exwife of purity culture megastar, Joshua Harris. This is going to be a 3 part series and sorry its so long but we have a lot to say.

episodes.title: 183. Tori Williams Douglass Interview Part I
episodes.description: Tori from Go Home Bible You're Drunk comes back on to talk about growing up in the church, leaving, her family and authoritarian parenting.

episodes.title: 182. The NEW Adventures Of Mcgee And Me
episodes.description: This week, we finish up our travels into the world of mcgee and me.

episodes.title: 180. McGee And Me Part 1
episodes.description: somehow got deleted and now reposted. our apologies.

episodes.title: 181. McGee And Me: PartII
episodes.description: We are back in the world of mcgee and me as we break down episodes 4-9.

episodes.title: 180. McGee And Me: Part I
episodes.description: Today we dive into the classic christian straight to vhs kids show, McGee And Me.

episodes.title: 179. The Bible Riots With Go Home Bible You're Drunk
episodes.description: This week, we are joined by Tori and Justin of Go Home Bible Your're Drunk and we talked about the Bible Riots or Nativist Riots Of 1844 in Philadelphia, Pa.

episodes.title: 178: Hell: Part III - Trinity
episodes.description: We finish up our discussion of hell and how it mutated and made its way into the modern evangelical belief system and a whole lot of trauma dumping.

episodes.title: 1. Where is your WWJD bracelet?
episodes.description:
This is the first episode where Donavon, Chrissy and I discuss the WWJD movement. 




intro and outro song used by permission from the band Iron Chic.

episodes.title: 177. Hell: Part II
episodes.description: This week we dive into the development of hell among the early church.

episodes.title: 176. H-E-L-L Double Hockey Sticks Part I
episodes.description: For this spooky season, we dive into something that has given evangelicals anxiety and that is hell. We go through the origins and evolution of it within Judaism and up to Jesus.

episodes.title: 175. The Phantom Patriot: Richard McCaslin
episodes.description: This week, Clifton from Your Music Saved Us joins us for a story about a Real Life Super Hero, The Phantom Patriot.

episodes.title: 174: Saturday Morning Mind Control Part III
episodes.description: We finish up Phil Phillip's book, Saturday Morning Mind Control.

episodes.title: 173: Saturday Morning Mind Control Part II
episodes.description: This week we dive back into Phil Phillip's book about the dangers of saturday morning cartoons.

episodes.title: 172: Saturday Morning Mind Control Part I
episodes.description: This week, we dive into another Phil Phillips book called Saturday Morning Mind Control

episodes.title: 171: Fray Tormenta: I am a Religious Man
episodes.description: This week, Chaz tries his best to bring a uplifting story to Chrissy and Donavon. And we think he succeeded! Hear the true story of the man that inspired the movie Nacho Libre. From his rough early years, tremendous losses and taking on the church to create his own orphanage(s).

episodes.title: 170: Pastor Bob Coy Part II: Give Him A Millstone
episodes.description: This week, Chaz concludes the story of Pastor Bob Coy, founder of one of the biggest branches of Calvary Chapel. We do our best to convey the level of monster Coy is. Trigger warning for this episode.

episodes.title: 169: Pastor Bob Coy Part I: Moral Failing
episodes.description: This week, Chaz tells Chrissy and Donavon the story of another Pastor Gone Bad. In part one, learn about how the founder of one of Calvary Chapels biggest branches set himself up to prey on his victim.

episodes.title: 168: Snake Handlers ( w/ Chelsea Weber Smith )
episodes.description: This week Chaz is joined by Chelsea Weber Smith of American Hysteria to discuss the American evangelical phenomenon of Snake Handlers. From it's origins to the many deaths, hear why it's not a power from the Lord. It's just dumb.

episodes.title: 167: WWJD: Back At One
episodes.description: This week, it's a surprise episode! Chrissy and Donavon had no idea this week what we were covering. But it's a redo of our very first episode. Find out where the phrase originated and how it influenced and manipulated many kids!

episodes.title: 166: The Matrix: Red Pilled
episodes.description: This week we're joined by Zak from The Escapist Room podcast. We dive deep into how the evangelical work forced a Jesus allegory onto a film about guns and self actualization. https://linktr.ee/excompod

episodes.title: 165: 3rd Grade Christian Science Part II
episodes.description: This week we complete our dissection of the Bob Jones 3rd Grade Science Text book. Things continue to unravel.

episodes.title: 164: 3rd Grade Christian Science Part I
episodes.description: This week we dive into the manipulative and down right ridiculous Bob Jones 3rd Grade Science text book. Get ready for some learning.

episodes.title: 163: Scott Okamoto: Asian American Apostate
episodes.description: This week we're joined by our i old friend and author of the book Asian American Apostate: Scott Okamoto. We discuss his book and his time as a professor at Azuzu Pacific University.

episodes.title: 162: Newsboys VII: Taited Loved
episodes.description: This week Chaz and Chrissy conclude our our series on the CCM titans, the Newsboys.

episodes.title: 161: Newsboys Part VII: Go Peter
episodes.description: This week Chaz and Chrissy dive further into the lore of the Newsboys. From their next album, GO, to Peter Furlers exit from the band and Michael Taits take over.

episodes.title: 160: Newsboys Part VI: Thriving Adoration
episodes.description: This week we dive deeper into the bowels of The Boys. We talk about their album Thrive, their introduction to Michael Tait of DC Talk, and their first worship album Adoration.

episodes.title: 159: Newsboys Part V: Love, Liberty, Microphones
episodes.description: This week we dive back into the most influential Christian band from Down Under, the Newsboys. We talk about their times on tour, abusive organizations they worked with, and we break down the albums Step Up To The Microphone & Love, Liberty, Disco.

episodes.title: 158 : Newsboys Part IV: Take Me To Your Leader
episodes.description: We dive even further into the madness that is the Newsboys. We discuss John James and his meltdown that led to him getting fired. And we dissect the albums Take Me To Your Leader

episodes.title: 157: Newsboys Part III: Not Ashamed Of Going Public
156: Newsboys Part II: Hell Is For The Boyz
episodes.description: This week we continue our series on the greatest Christian rockband from Australia with no original members, the Newsboys. We go further into heir career and dig into their albums Hell Is For Wimps and Boys Will Be Boyz.

episodes.title: 155: Newsboys Part I: Read All About It
episodes.description: This week, we start our deep dive into the Australian Christian "rock" band and tell our personal connections with their music. Then, we break down their first album. www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 154:James River Church, The Stronger Men's Conference and Toxic Masculinity
episodes.description: This week we turn our eyes not upon Jesus, but on the James River Church and the scandals and money they hemorrhage. We also discuss the damages of toxic masculinity.

episodes.title: 152: The Toronto Blessing Part 1
episodes.description: This week, we start our look into the prophecy and miracle filled saga known as The Toronto Blessing. www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 151: Kansas City Prophets Part II W/ Jay from Your Music Saved Us
episodes.description:
This week we finish up the tale of the Kansas City Prophets and the madness that led to the Toronto Blessing. We are also joined by Jay from Your Music Saved Us as he tells us his stories of being at IHOPKC.

www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 150: Kansas City Prophets Part I feat. Jay from 'Your Music Saved Us'
episodes.description: This week, we're joined by Jay from 'Your Music Saved Us' as we discuss the origins of The Kansas City Prophets. From Bob Jones' (not that one) wild prophecies to Mike Bickle making his name, it's a crazy start. www.excompod.com
subjects: International House of Prayer Kansas City

episodes.title: 151: Kansas City Prophets Part II W/ Jay from Your Music Saved Us
episodes.description: This week we finish up the tale of the Kansas City Prophets and the madness that led to the Toronto Blessing. We are also joined by Jay from Your Music Saved Us as he tells us his stories of being at IHOPKC. www.excompod.com
subjects: International House of Prayer Kansas City

episodes.title: 149: Kenneth Hagin Part II
episodes.description: We conclude our 2 part series on the vision-seeing madman.

episodes.title: 148: Kenneth Hagin Part I
episodes.description: This week, we start our journey into the giddy powerhouse known as Kenneth Hagin.

episodes.title: 147: The Beliefs Of The NAR w/Scott Okamoto
episodes.description: This week, we are joined by Scott Okamoto (author of Asian Apostate), to talk about the origins of the New Apostolic Reformation.

episodes.title: 146: Kathryn Kuhlman Part III
episodes.description: Chaz is solo today but we finish up the series on Kathryn Kuhlman and her insane life as a grifter and "miracle" worker.

episodes.title: 145: Kathryn Kuhlman Part II
episodes.description: This week we continue our series on The Miracle Lady. From her starting a church in a roller rink, to leading 4 hour services at Carnegie Hall and healing cancer.

episodes.title: 144: Kathryn Kuhlman Part I
episodes.description: This week we start our series on the Miracle Lady herself. Find out how Kuhlman walked, so all other televangelists could run. Look out for Mister! www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 143: A.A. Allen Part II
episodes.description: We conclude our series on the the tiny but mighty, A.A. Allen. We discuss his final years, his death and a dangerous cult that was influenced by the man. www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 142: A.A. Allen Part I
episodes.description: This week we continue our look into the madness that is Faith Healers! We bring you the origin of A.A. Allen! From his early days as a drunk toddler, to the flat out denial that his healing claims would actually work, this one JUST MIGHT end in a cult. Again. www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 141: Oarl Roberts Part IV
episodes.description: This week, we conclude our series in Oral Roberts. We discuss the paths his children took, the types of grifts he ran to get his hospitals and the death and impact of the titan of Faith Healing.

episodes.title: 140: Oral Roberts Part III
episodes.description: We journey further into the life of the grifter and his rise to power in Tulsa, his way of making a quick exit and fulfilling his father's prophecies.

episodes.title: 139: Oral Roberts Part II
episodes.description: This week we continue our tale of Oral Roberts, godfather of Prosperity Gospel and one of America's greatest grifters.

episodes.title: 138: Oral Roberts Part I
episodes.description: This week we start our deep dive into the godfather of Prosperity Gospel. From his early life with a curse of a brother, to his battle with tuberculosis and finding the Lord. Do some stretches, we got more Oral than you can handle.

episodes.title: 137: William Branham Part IV: The Final Chapter
episodes.description: This week we conclude our series on Branham. We talk his final years, his death and the different cults and other ways he left The Message behind.  www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 136: William Branham Part III
episodes.description: Sorry fo the late release! We bring you the third part in our deep dive on the faith healer turned cult leader. From his time with Jim Jones to his crazy stories to convince his congregation he's the second coming of Christ.  www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 135: William Branham Part II
episodes.description: This week we continue the story of the Faith Healer/Cult Leader. We cover more of the monsters he influenced, the lengths he went to convince his congregation and introduce a heavy hitter he toured with.  www.excompod.com

episodes.title: 134: William Branham Part I
episodes.description: This week, we dive into the life of one Christianity's biggest faith healers. We discuss his early life (and his tall tales), beginnings of his faith and the start of his Ministry/Cult.

episodes.title: 129: Mother Teresa: Part II
episodes.description: We conclude our series on Mother Teresa, as we discuss her criminal connections, the money and the effect of her "work" on society.   www.excompod.com  For all our links and merch! Theme by Iron Chic

episodes.title: 128: Mother Teresa: Part 1: Mama Mia
episodes.description: This week, Chrissy leads us on a journey through the early life of The saint Of The Gutters herself; Mother Teresa. Plus a little update on our pal Josh Harris.  www.excompod.com for all our links and merch! Please leave a review!

episodes.title: 69. Pat Robertson V
episodes.description: We finish up our series on Pat Robertson.

episodes.title: 68. Pat Robertson Part IV
episodes.description: We keep going deeper and deeper into Pat Robertson.

episodes.title: 67. Pat Robertson Part III
episodes.description: We dive further into Pat Robertson and his terrible and horrible existence.

episodes.title: 66. Pat Robertson Part II
episodes.description: We dive back into the life of Pat Robertson.

episodes.title: 65. Pat Robertson: Part I
episodes.description: This week, we start our deep dive into the almighty, Pat Robertson.

episodes.title: 25. Interview With Brent Detwiler: Covenant/SGM's Fall And Sexual Abuse Coverup.
episodes.description: This week I interview Brent Detwiler, who was a founding member of Covenant Life/SGM. We talk about this history of the church, his relationship with CJ Mahaney, the child sexual abuse cover and the roll that Joshua Harris played in it all.
